title: Daily Security News Digest
goal: Automatically aggregate and email security news every morning
inputs: RSS feeds (Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading, etc.)
steps:
1. Trigger: Schedule daily at 7 AM
2. Fetch RSS feeds
3. Filter for keywords (breach, vulnerability, ransomware)
4. Format as HTML email
5. Send via Gmail/Outlook

title: Automated Vulnerability Report
goal: Scan your network weekly and send summary report
steps:
1. Run Nmap scan on schedule
2. Parse XML output with Python
3. Identify open ports and services
4. Generate PDF report
5. Email to security team

title: Phishing Email Detector
goal: Flag suspicious emails in your inbox automatically
steps:
1. Monitor incoming emails
2. Check sender reputation
3. Analyze links and attachments
4. Flag or move suspicious emails
5. Log incidents to spreadsheet

title: Automated Security Patch Checker
goal: Check for updates and patch systems automatically
steps:
1. Connect to servers via SSH
2. Check for available updates
3. Test updates in staging
4. Apply patches during maintenance window
5. Verify and report status

title: WordPress Security Monitor
goal: Monitor WordPress sites for security issues
steps:
1. Fetch installed plugins via API
2. Check against vulnerability database
3. Scan for outdated versions
4. Alert if issues found
5. Generate remediation recommendations

title: Social Media Security Alerts
steps:
1. Monitor hashtags (#infosec, #cybersecurity)
2. Filter by engagement metrics
3. Extract links and summaries
4. Store in database
5. Daily digest email

title: Incident Response Ticketing
steps:
1. Receive alert webhook
2. Parse alert data
3. Classify severity
4. Create Jira/ServiceNow ticket
5. Assign to on-call team

title: Password Breach Checker
goal: Check if company emails appear in breaches
steps:
1. Load employee emails from CSV
2. Query HaveIBeenPwned API
3. Identify compromised accounts
4. Force password reset via AD
5. Email affected users

title: Cloud Cost Security Audit
steps:
1. Fetch IAM permissions
2. Analyze resource usage
3. Identify unused/overprivileged resources
4. Calculate cost savings
5. Generate recommendations report

title: Automated SSL Certificate Renewal
goal: Monitor and renew SSL certificates before expiry
steps:
1. Check certificate expiry dates
2. Alert 30 days before expiration
3. Auto-renew via Let's Encrypt
4. Deploy new certificate
5. Verify installation
